metadata.title: CVE-2019-12594 on Ubuntu 22.04 ESM (jammy) - medium
metadata.description:
DOSBox 0.74-2 has Incorrect Access Control.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2019-12594` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

dosbox - 0.74-3-1
dosbox-debug - 0.74-3-1
Available with Ubuntu Pro: https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: dosbox package in esm-apps/jammy, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '0.74-3-1').
